property.name: text
property.value: General Model Description:This model shows a intersection between four roads controlled by one traffic lights for each road.The crossing actor has a sensor that measures type, speed and distance of an vehicle. A distinction is made between autonomous cars and human-driven cars.If the sensor only perceives autonomous cars, all traffic lights are switched to green,otherwise the crossing actor takes over the traffic light control.The Poisson Clock generates a new vehicle with a certain speed.

property.name: script
property.value: // Put your JavaScript program here.// Refer to parameters in scope using dollar-sign{parameterName}.// See: https://wiki.eecs.berkeley.edu/accessors/Version1/AccessorSpecificationexports.setup = function () { // this.input('input'); this.input('type'); this.input('speed'); // this.output('output'); this.output('tl1'); this.output('tl2'); this.output('tl3'); this.output('tl4');};exports.initialize = function () { var self = this; this.addInputHandler('input', function () { self.send('output', self.get('input') * 2); });};

property.name: note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: text
property.value: Road Model Description:This is where human-controlled cars are generated and autonomous cars are sent in.To prevent two cars from being on the road at the same time, they are merged into an ordered row.

property.name: text
property.value: Road.merge Description:This is where human-controlled cars are generated and autonomous cars are sent in.Human-driven cars and autonomous cars come in and are given a certain order.Type, speed and distance are then forwarded.
